name: Milk Drink
description: You create a tasty drink that heals your or an allyâ€™s wounds. The recipient gains 2d6 + MOVE hit points.
higherLevels: The dice roll for this move changes to 3d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works great if the user goes first this turn.
